AssetProperty.description: The asset property's definition, alias, unit, and notification state.

properties.name: Alias
properties.description: The property alias that identifies the property.

type.description: The property alias that identifies the property.

properties.name: NotificationState
properties.description: The MQTT notification state (ENABLED or DISABLED) for this asset property.

type.description: The MQTT notification state (ENABLED or DISABLED) for this asset property.

properties.name: Unit
properties.description: The unit of measure (such as Newtons or RPM) of the asset property. If you don't specify a value for this parameter, the service uses the value of the assetModelProperty in the asset model.

type.description: The unit of measure (such as Newtons or RPM) of the asset property. If you don't specify a value for this parameter, the service uses the value of the assetModelProperty in the asset model.

AssetHierarchy.description: A hierarchy specifies allowed parent/child asset relationships.

properties.name: LogicalId
properties.description: The LogicalID of a hierarchy in the parent asset's model.

type.description: The LogicalID of a hierarchy in the parent asset's model.

properties.name: ChildAssetId
properties.description: The ID of the child asset to be associated.

type.description: The ID of the child asset to be associated.

properties.name: AssetModelId
properties.description: The ID of the asset model from which to create the asset.

type.description: The ID of the asset model from which to create the asset.

properties.name: AssetName
properties.description: A unique, friendly name for the asset.

type.description: A unique, friendly name for the asset.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the asset.

type.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the asset.
